experience.description:
Responsibilities: full cycle design and development of the entire server architecture from the ground. Implementation and supporting all backend's services.

Languages: Go, Python
Technologies: AWS services (with main focus on serverless)

Responsibilities: active development backend for dating app with tens of millions of users.
Designing and developing recommendation service based on graph db.

Languages: Java, Go
Technologies: ElasticSearch, AWS DynamoDB, Neo4J, AWS Kinesis, AWS SQS, AWS
Lambda, Docker, AWS EMR, Spark

Designing and building distributed, extremely modern and highly available cloud technologies that scale up to hundreds of millions of users.

Took part in several projects. The most interesting are :

Identity - scalable, reliable and secure cloud based Identity and profile management system for millions of Angry Birds's fans and other Rovio games.

Assets - scalable, reliable and secure cloud based service provides support for storing and retrieving game assets. Assets service is developed as part of the Identity-product.

Catalog - scalable, reliable and secure cloud based service contains virtual items (virtual currency, power-ups etc) that are purchased and delivered to clients (games).

Wallet - scalable, reliable and secure cloud based monetization service for Rovio's next generation games.

Technologies: Java, Scala, Play framework, Akka, NoSql, AWS

Developing the server side components for highly scalable social multiplayer games.
Working together with the game teams to implement new features and services for social games.
Accurately provide technical level-of-effort and schedule estimates on short notice and with incomplete data.

Gangs of Boomtown.
On Facebook http://apps.facebook.com/gangsofboomtown/
On Google Plus http://plus.google.com/games/400605714621

Languages: Java, Flash
Technologies: Java Servlet, JSON, Google Guice, Memcached, Redis, MySql.
Platforms:	Java 6

experience.description: Development a product called Informatica Data Director™ which is a Web 2.0 Java based application working on the top of Informatica Multidomain MDM Hub™.

experience.description:
Development design of cluster and implementation of its services. 

Development DataSynapse’s services.
Development of search engine for querying data in a Grid using SpEL as query language. Implementation Read-Through, Write-Through, Write-Behind, and Refresh-Ahead Caching policies. Development MBeans for manage Coherence (start of pre-loading and clearing caches and etc.).
Collect and analyze statistics using standard Coherence's JMX Reporting system. 
Performance tuning (include JVM tuning, using indexes, pof serialization and etc.). 
Investigation the Coherence Incubator project. Implementation Coherence Common pattern (production), Coherence messaging and Coherence push-replication patterns (in dev. mode).

Languages:	Java
Technologies:	Oracle Coherence 3.5.3/3.6, , DataSynapse 5, Incubator’s patterns, coherence-tools, Spring 3, Quartz
Platforms:	JDK1.5

This includes private customers, who administrate their contracts from home, as well as sales partners, who perform the administration tasks for private customers in one of the sales points.
